column2: the sangria. Not a bad price on the half and full pitchers if it was worth drinking. Which it is not. Perhaps I'm spoiled
column3: but to me sangria should still taste like wine. Yes
column4: you should have a bit of sweetness and be able to taste the fruit clearly
column5: but it shouldn't taste like koop aid that someone dumped some red wine in to. I hear their margaritas and cocktails are much better.
